Register Your Brand with Amazon's Trademark Registration
s: February 24, 2025 - Trademarks give you nationwide protection for your brand. Other sellers will not be able to use your trademarked brand name or logo to sell products, unless it’s with your permission. We highly recommend word mark. It’s easier and cleaner and best for Amazon.

t: Amazon Brand Registry Requirements - Process, Costs & Benefits
s: July 14, 2017 - Amazon Brand Registry is a way to protect your brand on Amazon. In the US, if you have a registered trademark (get it here), you can inform Amazon and prevent anyone except you from using your brand there.

t: Trademark Q&A: Is a logo trademark accepted by Amazon Brand Registry?
s: Yes, Amazon Brand Registry accepts both wordmarks and figurative (logo) trademarks. Just make sure the trademark is identical to the brand you use on Amazon.
